metadata.name: Infinite Memo: Not Your Keys, Not Your Coins
metadata.description: An infinite crypto art collaboration with The Ledger Company (Paris, France). I've used representations of Ledger hardware wallets before in my digital art, so it just made total sense to me to accept their invitation to collaborate on a work of art for their NFT collection. We both share the same believe in self-sovereign individuals and artists, who understand the importance of holding securely the keys to the wallets they use to sign their works of crypto art, and the crypto assets that they get in exchange for it. Inspired by this shared love for sovereignty, I've made this infinity room the first one to be ever minted on its own contract (Manifold). This is also the first infinity room I've done and minted since I moved to Lisboa, Portugal. 1 ♾️ loop, MP4, 2500px x 2600px. 2022.
